TopicTitle: What do you think about new KSP 0.22 preview viido?

Articles.Content:

The new scientific features can be very motivating.

I would be glad for warp function in space port, it would be cool in transferring craft to other planets.

I'm ready For science!

ZodiaK. WANT that graphic at the end

Compared to some other games (yes, I'm looking at you, Duke Nuke'm, but also you, Half-Life) where you get lots of teasers and then... nothing, this is amazing. The science experiments look gorgeous, and I hope the R&D section doesn't kill the frame rate on the space center too much, but it surely looks impressive.

Wait, so the specimen container lets us expose Kerbin wildlife to outer space? I can taste the discussions already!

Player #1: "I refuse to use the Specimen Container, no animal experiments in my KSP thank you!"

Player #2: "I just flew a probe with eleventyfive Specimen Containers into the Sun! Burn, vermin!"

Yeah science. And subassemblies! Totally happy with it. I just hope they add customizable folder structures or a search feature for the subassemblies, because i use subassemblies a lot. It would be somewhat annoying to have to scroll through pages of launch vehicles just to find the rover you want to load.
Finally I can science while I rocket!
Subassemblies sound awesome, especially being able to move between the SPH and VAB. Also like the idea of the specimen containers. Again, it's something to do, and that's always fun.

Wait, so the specimen container lets us expose Kerbin wildlife to outer space? I can taste the discussions already!

Given how ethical we treat the Kerbals... it shouldn't be too much of an issue.

And I'm sure we'll see some awesome mods for the Radiation Exposure test:

  • Fluffy bunnies
  • Kittens
  • Puppies

Bring it on!
"Yo dog, I heard you like rockets and science! So I put a little rocket with a science lab in your science lab. Now you can rocket while you science and science while you rocket."
Definitely going to find Sub-assemblies so useful! Love how they are showing features for the new update, get's me all excited d'awh
Surely we wouldn't see animals that we know, but analogues of the ones earth? Like Kerbals are to humans, maybe we have Kernines? Kats? I doubt it would be actual animals that exist on earth.
Marmots. For some reason I can't help but imagine any other animal going for a Kerbish space ride than marmots.

Yes yes yes yes yes when does it come out???
Just wow. Can't wait.

I looks good. I like the progression.

But I'm a little worried that science is nothing more than: Sciencecontainer *click* , Antenna *click* = Science done.

That would be a shame.

I hope that the Kerbals on EVA have to do something to get some experiments done with Animations etc.

Thats at least what I had in my mind when I heared that you can do science in the future.

The science-tree is really looking good and I can't wait to get my hands on it.
